website_summaries.verdict: Be a naughty Santa with this faux tattooed men's shirt.
pros: An option for those who are looking for an edgier look
Partly mesh, so keeps you cool
A way to try out tattoos with no regrets
cons: Not actually a sweater, this shirt is not very warm
Pale skin tone won't look right on everyone

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas shirt!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best ugly Christmas sweater (silky shirt) I have ever seen. We were the hit of the party. I would recommend that you buy the size you wear or smaller so the tattoos look real.
customer_reviews.author: Playful57

customer_reviews.title: Medium sizing help
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' 11" and 168 pounds. The medium is the right fit. The arms are tight as they should be and about 3/4 inch too long. The torso has a bit too much room, so it fits like a normal shirt. Which is ok since I don't have the flat stomach like the model. So if you weigh up to 180 it would work. The large was too big for me everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holiday hit!
customer_reviews.text: Holiday hit! Lots of second looks from tattoo admirers and plenty of giggles from the crowd. Was lots of fun to wear and has held up in the washing machine and dryer. Fit better than expected. Will get several seasons of wear.
customer_reviews.author: target'

customer_reviews.title: Rocker Santa
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt for an ugly Christmas sweater contest and it was pretty cool. I loved that it was thin material as I had a beard, and Santa hat on as well. Good material but fits a little small. Im 5'10" and 175 and the medium fit my waist and back but was tight around the shoulders and chest, which in fairness is how most things fit me. The sleeves from a distant got mistaken for tattoos multiple times and everyone loved my look. I won the contest and had a great time! I wish the chest part of the shirt was a little more flesh colored but all in all good shirt for some laughs.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick79

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the expectation of using it for one night, figuring that since it was a novelty item, it would probably be falling apart after one use. I was surprised by the quality. It seems like it will last as long or longer than any of my other shirts. Probably longer, since there won't be many occasions to wear it. It looks super realistic from behind and would probably be a big hit in a dark bar, since the skin tone will likely not match up very well in the daylight. Overall, awesome shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for some good laughs.
customer_reviews.text: Great for us bigger guys if your confident enough to wear tight fitting attire in public! Ha Remember that this is NOT American sizes so it will be tight..... but you need it that way as well to get the best effect for this type shirt. It was my “backup plan” that I wore under my Ugly Sweater to work. When I didn’t win the contest on the technicality that I was voted against just so I would reveal my “backup plan” (that I always have) so the sweater came off and this shirt won the contest.
customer_reviews.author: McNeil Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Better than a sweater.
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome and makes everyone laugh. Much better than a sweater in my opionon.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: You will turn heads
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our "Ugly Christmas Sweater" outing involving an Escape Room and Dinner with friends. This received so many comments on how they actually thought I had Tats on my arms and would go out bare chested? Granted this is not a sweater, the spirit was there. **Note - this thing is Sheer - as in your can see through it - so no dark undershirts to get full effect.** Great way to make a statement or get noticed
customer_reviews.author: MSA

customer_reviews.title: Outrageous! But fun.
customer_reviews.text: I wore the outrageous Faux Christmas T-Shirt at my Thanksgiving Party and my guests were either chuckling or laughing. It didn't fit their expectation of my character or personality. So pictures were taken. One guest commented that the color of the sleeves matched my skin color. Afterwards, I changed into more sensible. Should I wear this at an Ugly Christmas Sweater Party or not in December?
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Great holiday shirt !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage son . He Loves it ! I'm really impressed with the faux sleeves . The detail is excellent . The fit is good I bought an XL . The shirt is a bit loose . My son is 5'10 170 pounds . The print is vibrant and bright . The shirt is a poly type blend . Not a sweater .it is light weight . My only complaint is that my son finds the faux sleeve material a bit itchy . Great shirt for the holidays . My son will be wearing it to our annual Festivus party .
customer_reviews.author: True M

customer_reviews.title: sleeves are (appropriately) narrow
customer_reviews.text: Fun shirt. Bought for a party- and have now used it for (seasonal) running. The sleeves are tighter than you'd find on a normal long sleeved T- so the sleeve tattoo effect almost seems real (if you don't look too closely). Had a few friends surprised that I had full arm tats that they didn't know about.. .until they looked closer. :) it is what it is. looks great (or hideous- but that's what's intended)
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun shirt for Grandpa
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my spouse. The family got a kick out of it on Christmas Eve. It is very nice quality. It is, however, big. With it being blousy, it took away from the tattoo look. I, of course, ordered it too late to exchange it before Christmas. I'll probably order another one next year and give the larger one to my son.
customer_reviews.author: cmitch

customer_reviews.title: I was the hit of Ugly Christmas Sweater Party
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to do the ugly sweater thing every year, but this shirt was just what the doctor ordered for my personality. I am not a small guy, so I was a little worried about the fit, I didn't want it to be tight, but the XXL fits me perfectly, a few people who saw me from a distance thought that I was all tatted up.
customer_reviews.author: John Palmay

customer_reviews.title: Great look...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after the large was a little tight (Im about 5'10" 230lb). Sleeve length was perfect though (bout 33"). X-large still looked great. Lots of compliments. Colors are vibrant and even when stretched slightly it doesn't fade. Not heavy either -- breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Venis

customer_reviews.title: If you want to make an impression at your ugly sweater event this will do it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife thought I lost my mind, but I love it! Fit was perfect and the faux sleeves have everyone doing a double take. So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious and awesome party shirt
customer_reviews.text: Fit is a little tight but this shirt wouldn't look right if it hung loose so that's fine. Looks really cool, definitely a fun thing to wear at parties. Maybe juuuuust a little bit cheap feeling but honestly not a deal breaker at this price point for a funny gag shirt. Definitely worth it especially if you want attention at the ugly sweater party.
customer_reviews.author: AlphaFoxtrot

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious for ugly sweater parties
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for 2 years now and it always gets a laugh. Everyone does a double take. The sleeves match skin really well. I actually wore this as part of a Halloween costume too, covering up the Christmas sweater part with another shirt, and just letting the sleeves show for a tattooed arm look. Great print.
customer_reviews.author: B. T.

customer_reviews.title: I got a lot of compliments from Bikers about this shirt
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved it but it fits very tight around the arms and it's hard to remove the wrinkles without trying to grab the pantyhose like material to remove wrinkles of material on the skin. I felt like the incredible hulk about to rip the shirt when I flexed my biceps. Wish the skin color was lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick the engineer

customer_reviews.title: Cool shirt; a little uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Look, this is not an every day shirt--it's between a costume and a shirt--so it's fun to wear. Overall the fit is great, the graphics are well done and it's pretty well made. But, since it's a polyester, it's not terribly comfortable, but I have sensitive skin. I'd buy this again though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best holiday clothes I own!
customer_reviews.text: So I have the medium size and it fits exactly how I expected. I love that the sleeves are a spandex blend so they can be smaller and fit tight. The color of the sleeve fake skin matches my time so I'm happy there. Red pants work perfectly with it!! Love this shirt. It's more of a shooter than a sweater btw. But who cares, sweaters are too warm for inside anyway. Especially when drinking lol! Happy holidays everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Biznas

customer_reviews.title: Fun shirt - sure to make you smile!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because I felt he needed some cheering up. He's been sick for several months and felt he needed something to put a smile on his face. It worked! The shirt looks so cute on him. It does run a little small so I would advise going up one size. The quality is good. I'm not real crazy about the polyester fabric but my husband doesn't seem to mind. I love that it isn't a sweater, just has the illusion of a sweater so will not be too warm in a milder climate like we are presently having in St. Louis.
customer_reviews.author: Debmeistertoo

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Holiday Attire!
customer_reviews.text: This made quite the impression at the Tomball, Texas, German Christmas Market & Festival! From a distance it looked legit enough for young vixens with a thing for Old Saint Nick to give me a scandalous once over, festival security to give me the eye, the pious to pray for me and scowling mothers to grab their staring children protectively. Up close it drew laughter and admiration.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Myers

customer_reviews.title: I Won the UGLY Sweater Contest !!
customer_reviews.text: Shirt was a HIT at the Family Christmas party. Nobody expected the old-fat-white-guy to dress up like an "inked up" biker dude. I usually wear an XL size shirt so that's what I bought. Fit as expected. Quick shipping and good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Gill

customer_reviews.title: Hysterical!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I got this for my husband to wear to his company Christmas party. It was a huge hit! The "arms" are so realistic that you almost need to touch them to see if they are real. It was comfortable and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea, had to return
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug for it's size, so I rated it Somewhat Small for fitment. But the real reason I returned was because I don't know anybody that is as pale as the skin tone they used for this shirt. I'm very fair skinned and untanned, but it wasn't even close to matching. These seem like they were modeled after Abraham Lincoln's long arms, because despite the snug fit, the arms were too long causing the "tattoos" to bunch up lol. Couldn't wear it to a party, not even as a joke. Amazon kindly refunded me in full.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great christmas shirt. , different .
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt. Fooled many people ! Got me second place at sweater contest. Some called it ugly, other called it badsss. You make the decision for yourself. Was happy with it !
customer_reviews.author: Corey orey oh

customer_reviews.title: Great image detail, printed on both sides, nice material
customer_reviews.text: Funny shirts! Sizes run more accurately to USA standards. Nice poly knit fabric soft to touch, decent weight. Tattoo arms are stretchy and intended to fit more like a sock. Full 360 degree image, front & back. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: April Scoles

customer_reviews.title: Great find!!
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is hilarious. Perfect for our yearly Christmas party. I haven’t washed it yet so not sure how it will wash up. But the fit is perfect for my 5’11” 175 lb husband.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey fitch

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: I’m used to ordering these shirts a size bigger because they typically run a little small. This one does not, it’s pretty true to size. It looks great and I look forward to wearing it to my Christmas party!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Stewart

customer_reviews.title: a little loose
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 48" in a suit jacket with 36-38" waist, this XXL fit well in the shoulders but the sleeves fit a little loose, may have elected to try the XL although it may have been snug across the shoulders, overall I cant wait to wear next holiday season
customer_reviews.author: yldhawg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an xl tee shirt. Want it tight so the sleeves looked realistic so ordered a large. Was not disappointed. It fit tight just as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't look like the picture
customer_reviews.text: While the description is now about right, it doesn't look much like the picture. I never even took it out of the bag before sending it back. It certainly was not an ugly Christmas sweater like it appeared.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Pure FUN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let your alter ego come alive with this fun Biker Christmas shirt. It's soft, comfortable and fits to size as expected. The t-shirt sleeves on top of the long sleeves help to make it look real, at least for a second. We facetimed with our daughter and she noticed immediately and said "what are you wearing?" We all got a good chuckle out of this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Vickster624

customer_reviews.title: Freaking awesome better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This top is hilarious and fits perfectly, the colors and the material are top-quality, I couldn’t have asked for anything more specially at this price. Nice touch on this sleeves which really makes it great. awesome
customer_reviews.author: TonyTheDad

customer_reviews.title: Love it and I got a lot of comments on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it and I got a lot of comments on it. I played in a beach volleyball tournament and went to the gym in it. It was hot, but worth the looks. People thought the suspenders and tattoos were both real. Nice job.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl O

customer_reviews.title: Be the cool Santa
customer_reviews.text: The large was a good size for me, I’m 5’11 and 190lbs. If most shirts fit snug on your arms, the sleeves on this shirt will be a lot tighter than the body. This shirt provides no warmth lol, because the sleeves are basically mesh. This shirt got A LOT of attention and most people thought the sleeves were real tattoos!
customer_reviews.author: Sdk

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice breaker, and head turner
customer_reviews.text: I'm a sensible person with not a single tattoo on my body; however, when I wore the shirt to the office on casual Friday, I had my fellow employees doing double takes and laughing their heads off. It really liven up the work environment and now there is a competition of whom will wear the most outlandish item on casual Friday. On a factual note, the shirt fit great and not at all uncomfortable. Have fun with this!
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio N. Pina

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Ugly Christmas Tattoo Sweater but was a tiny bit small
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it and got lots of comments, double takes, and stares. It was on the edge of being too small but its supposed to be tight in the arms to add to the realistic tattoo look.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Patteson

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for a friend. He wore (and one) to a couple of Tacky Christmas parties. Got a lot of laughs and maybe even a date. Was pleasantly surprised at the quality. Many times the "tattoo" sleeves can be flimsy and tear easily, this one was much nicer. He said he had no problems washing but did not put in dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Nonomous

customer_reviews.title: Won best holiday getup contest...
customer_reviews.text: As a woman size 6, I ordered a small and only had to take the sides and under arms in. I wore my hair and makeup in “pinup” style. Family members did recognize me. Good quality. Fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like that is thin material
customer_reviews.text: I have to believe this runs small for a man because I am a 5'2 125 lb woman and the small fit me well. It does have a little give in it though. I wore this to an ugly Christmas sweater party and it received rave reviews. I really like that is thin material. In Texas we had a warm Christmas and a real sweater would have made me melt!
customer_reviews.author: pmmedina

customer_reviews.title: Funny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it big because I was worried about it being too small. Then our office didn't even have the ugly sweater party that they had talked about. Oh well, it's in my closet for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great shirt!
customer_reviews.text: You're guaranteed to be a winner if you wear this to your next holiday party! The tattoos are so realistic, that I kept having to slide glance at my dad as he wore it to our annual Family Ugly Sweater Contest. As a side note, he walked away with 70% of the vote..... It's a great shirt!
customer_reviews.author: April W

customer_reviews.title: Great for your Christmas party!
customer_reviews.text: Worn to the work Christmas party. Looked great, especially with a black cowboy hat. Several people though I actually had arm tattoos which blows me away because I wear short sleeves to work.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Looked great with a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Was great fun. My brother and I got similar shirts and went shopping a couple of days before Christmas got all kinds of comments and looks. Most people thought the tattoos were real at first glance.
customer_reviews.author: M. West

customer_reviews.title: Great Gag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gag item. It is not a T shirt in my opinion. It is 100 % polyester, so washing will be different, but it is exactly as described and pictured, and will be lots of fun at the party.
customer_reviews.author: shiny knight

customer_reviews.title: So funny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt for my son and it is great. I wish I had gone up a size The reviews said it needed to be tight but it really only needs to be tighter on the arms which I think still would have been ok because he is muscular and then it would have been more comfortable in the stomach area where he is not as muscular
customer_reviews.author: Coaches67

customer_reviews.title: Won the office ugly sweater contest in a landslide. ...
customer_reviews.text: Won the office ugly sweater contest in a landslide. Resold it on ebay the next week for what I paid for it. Tired of losing? Pair this with a skull cap and some shades and you will dominate. NOTE: if your office does not have a sense of humor, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: glennn

customer_reviews.title: Great Ugly Christmas Shirt!
customer_reviews.text: Great Ugly Christmas occasion short. It’s different and you will get laughs. Glad we purchased. Runs a bit large, but nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: RiffDiva

customer_reviews.title: Soo funny/great shirt
customer_reviews.text: My husband won "ugliest xmas sweater" with this outfit. It is the best. Everyone absolutely loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: palmtree4ever

customer_reviews.title: Loved!! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this shirt and received a lot of compliments! I went up a size, but the shirt was still too tight around his upper arms. His arms are bigger than average though.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: It’s a contest winner!! 🏅
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for an ugly sweater contest. Won 3rd place out of about 50 people! This shirt is hysterical and even weirder on.
customer_reviews.author: Tominphx

customer_reviews.title: My son in law Bo
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love this shirt looked real and now my son in law can have tats during the holidays. Oh yea. Perfect fit. This is the small
customer_reviews.author: BGL

customer_reviews.title: A gift for a Christmas Eve Part.
customer_reviews.text: Everything as advertised. A gross white elephant gift for Christmas Eve party.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Shirt!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this shirt have had a lot of outstanding comments and double takes wearing this during Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Better than you'd expect!
customer_reviews.text: So flipping awesome! It looks way better in person than in the pictures. I showed up to my department's xmas party in this, a fake mustache, and some fake aviator glasses - people honestly didn't even recognize me! It looks REAL. And it's cheap. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: TacomaCyclist

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun Party shirt
customer_reviews.text: Material is comfortable and soft. Colors are vibrant and garment is well made. Many laughs and compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Tambra

customer_reviews.title: Won the ugly sweater contest
customer_reviews.text: was used in a ugly sweater contest ...its a shirt not sweater material but so ugly it won...lol
customer_reviews.author: mary lou sutton

customer_reviews.title: HILARIOUS
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband, he is 6"2 180lbs and the xl was really big on him. He loves it though and wore it every day during the holiday season! lol
customer_reviews.author: MellyWhoDo

customer_reviews.title: It’s probabily best for men
customer_reviews.text: The ladies loved my flowing chest hair. It was like chewbacca and fergie made a baby and printed it onto a shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Family

customer_reviews.title: Tattoo sweater
customer_reviews.text: Great transaction. Fast delivery. Happy with quality of product. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: I actually won my work ugly sweater contest with this shirt! It’s definitely a laugh out loud shirt when anyone reads it for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shirt
customer_reviews.text: This quickly became one of my most popular Christmas shirts of all time. The tats look so realistic that I get many double-takes at the stores and a lot of comments. The size was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa Marty

customer_reviews.title: Really great for 20 bucks
customer_reviews.text: Super realistic design has little details you really have to "find" to realize are there. Sleeves are actually built into the shirt so the arms look even more realistic. I'm 5 foot 7 143 lbs and I found the size small perfect. Sleeves are intentionally skin tight so they look real. Can't wait to wear out!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael_Inc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shirt, doesnt quite work for women
customer_reviews.text: Am a woman, so the 3d affect doesn't quite work, but it's still a fun shirt. Little right across the chest because it's not made for women, but I was expecting that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big hit at Xmas Eve party
customer_reviews.text: It was a big hot at family ugly sweater Christmas Eve party. I won first prize.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Faux real 3D ugly shirt/sweater
customer_reviews.text: Looks real if it matches your skin tone ! 3 D effect pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Would YOU let your children sit on this Santa's lap? HOHOHOHOHOHAHAHAHA!!
customer_reviews.text: Here my husband is shown sucking on a Tootsie-pop pillaged from the candy to be thrown to children at a small-town Christmas parade. He wore his shirt on a parade float (FYI he WAS NOT the official Santa!) and got thumbs-up from some sketchy characters; then won "Ugliest" at an Ugly Sweater Party! Folks really thought this super-conservative old guy was inked! WHAT FUN!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol R. Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Very tight garnet.
customer_reviews.text: The detail and materials aren’t bad. But this is skin tight. If that’s what you want, great. If not order one size larger. The arm and torso length is generous as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Shirt
customer_reviews.text: I wore this to a Christmas party and it was definitely a hit. Also stopped at Jersey Mikes to sandwiches to take to some friends and got good comments from staff and people in line. The shirt is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Greg C

customer_reviews.title: It's a regular fit, and very true to size.
customer_reviews.text: The shirt is perfect. It's well made, sturdy, and fits well. In the photos it looks like it's a slim cut, but it's not; it's a regular fit, which is what I need. I can't wait to wear it to "Ugly sweater day" at work.
customer_reviews.author: JDFla

customer_reviews.title: Talk of the party
customer_reviews.text: Awesome conversation piece. Folks loved it at the annual Crooked Rooster Brewery Ugly Sweater party. Tats look realistic from a short distance.
customer_reviews.author: ShepFL

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty cool people thought I had really stupid santa tattoos ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty cool people thought I had really stupid santa tattoos on my body. The wrists are too tight though to the point where it was cutting off circulation to my arms, and making me feel cold on my arms while wearing it. The crazy thing is I have really thin wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Thiago

customer_reviews.title: Turns Heads
customer_reviews.text: Wore this to my ugly sweater Christmas party this year and literally had ppl turning heads all night. Some friends who knew me came closer mentioning they didn’t know I had so many tattoos. Great alternative to the traditional ugly sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All ink'd up and everywhere to go
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious ugly Christmas sweater option for work. Went to Honeybaked Ham store for a Chriatmas ham wearing the shirt and had numerous people ask where I had gotten it. If that wasn't enough, had some of my coworkers ask if I had lost a bet to wear this crazy shirt- mission accomplished!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Shuey

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore this to our ugly sweater party, looked awesome and was so much fun. He likes the material as it’s more lightweight then a sweater but the patter looks great.
customer_reviews.author: DDonia7

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes Santa prefers naughty
customer_reviews.text: I wore this for my ugly Christmas sweater day. It was a fail. It’s not ugly. It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.author: The doctor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shirt
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for an ugly sweater party and it was a hit! He was the talk of the party with all his new tattoos!
customer_reviews.author: KACP

customer_reviews.title: Funny for parties.
customer_reviews.text: I am way conservative. When I showed up at the party a co-workers wife wishpered to her husband if the tats are real?
customer_reviews.author: Toonces

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FUN GIFT
customer_reviews.text: SUPER FUN GIFT, LOTS OF COMPLIMENTS!!! We got a 2xx & it was snug! But We love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: DEBBELL

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Came in 3rd place for sweater out of a few thousand people at an ugly sweater party using this gem.
customer_reviews.author: Sarulle

customer_reviews.title: I loved it
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. Used it as an ugly sweater day at the gym. Used it a couple of times at work. Everyone liked it. When I went out to have lunch, people thought the tattoos were real. It was fun to wear
customer_reviews.author: Mondo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt, got nothing but compliments when wearing it. Its nice to have some fun around the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: AverageDad

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Shirt
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is awesome! My husband won the Christmas party prize because of it. Some people at the party, that we haven't met before, actually thought my husband was all tattooed up! Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Marcucci

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Washed it once on cold, it’s faded and pilled already. Haven’t even worn it.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian B.

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt!
customer_reviews.text: This fit my son perfect! It looks so funny on. It is tighter in the sleeves but it is made to look like your skin so that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Francis

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Turned out to be a nice fit for my boyfriend. We were a little disappointed that it wasn't actually a sweater not was it cotton. It is like under armour material.
customer_reviews.author: TCoop

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is fun for the ugly sweater type christmas party time frame. It is NOT a sweater but a polyester shirt, but the idea is the same.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Loving the skull Santa.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for Tacky Christmas Sweater (living in the south no sweater needed). Everyone loved. I was very pleased with the quality of the tattoo sleeves. Not flimsy like others I have seen. Washed well with no problems. He probably wore it 3 times during the season.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Party Shirt for Old Biker Guys!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband, who has recently started riding a motorcycle in his middle age. He absolutely loved the shirt and received lots of compliments, laughs, and smiles when he wore it to a Christmas party. It totally rocked!

customer_reviews.text: The effect is great. People really react to it. The fabric is a little uncomfortable, but for a few hours it isn't too bad. Well worth the comments.

product_meta.title: Faux Real Men's 3D Photo-Realistic Ugly Christmas Tattoo Sweater Long Sleeve T-Shirt
product_meta.description: The XMAS biker sweater with/ tattoos is bound to be the baddest sweater at your party. All the style of a leather vest with tattoo sleeves wrapped up in a comfortable big and tall size t-shirt for the holidays. This super realistic t-shirt with a biker vest, green Christmas tree sweater and Tattoo arm sleeves is sure to get a lot of second looks! Live free, ride free!
feature_bullets: Photorealistic design so real it will make you look twice
Gives you an instant outfit complete with an attitude adjustment
